hymn.title: The Wonderful Works of Your Hands!

layout.singingstanza: Oh, Lord, how we love the works of Your hands, The works of Your hands, the works of Your hands! Oh, Lord, how we love the works of Your hands, The won -- der -- ful works of Your hands!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2012 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Oh, Lord, how we love the works of Your hands, The works of Your hands, the works of Your hands! Oh, Lord, how we love the works of Your hands, The wonderful works of Your hands!
The whispering pines in the forest so green; A tree with a limb that can hold up a swing! The geese who are honking, the robins that sing: Are the wonderful works of Your hands!
The sun shining brightly just after the rain, A field that is waving with golden grain; The weather and seasons which You have ordained: Are the wonderful works of Your hands!
The herbs and the plants and the flowers and trees, The birds in the sky, the fish in the seas! Plus animals, insects and people we see, Are the wonderful works of Your hands!
